name: 3P eVentures
tag_list: twitter, twitter-app, twitter-ios-app, klout-score, klout, social-score, social-infulence, tags, trends, trending, trending-tags, followers, follower-feedback, follower-infulence, follower-opinion
overview:
PegTweets is a free IOS twitter app. In addition to being twitter client, it has Klout integration for Social Score, Trending #tags, auto update of tweets with selected #tag and interactive tweets to engage your Followers.

Klout integration gives the social score of Followers & those you Follow, understand the topics of their interest and determine your own Social relevance.

Trending #tags can be selected for a City and they get auto updated. Any of the trending #tag can be selected to see all the tweets on this topic, including auto updates so that you read the continuous feed.

All of us tweet, but we do not know how many of our Followers read it or their opinion. InteractiveTweet is a feature that lets you tweet with an option for your Followers to comment. The Follower comments are summarised in a graphical display, with option to read each of their comments. Good tool for celebrities and companies to stay connected with their Followers.

Some more features are being worked on and will be added in the near future, including the Android version of the app.
